app.name: XRoarWii
app.long_description:
This is a port of XRoar(0.24), a Tandy CoCo/Dragon32 emulator. Here are the menu controls and special buttons used in-game.
Wiimote:
A/2 : Confirm B/1 : Back - : Open virtual keyboard + : Select joystick mode/toggle option Home : Open main menu/help
Classic controller:
A : Confirm B : Back - : Open virtual keyboard + : Select joystick mode/toggle option Home : Open main menu/help
GameCube controller:
A : Confirm B : Back L : Toggle option Z : Select joystick mode Start : Open main menu/help
See the Readme/manual for more information.
